Write-Up Text: People are engaging with the Australian government's federal budget on social media. Some are excited about a petition that aims to tackle invasive species while others express concerns around First Nations people's justice and mental health reforms. While some people remain confused about budget allocations others break down the impacts on students and housing. A top doctor questions whether a pledge to boost bulk-billing truly benefits Australians. The federal budget is inspiring various responses calling attention to the range of issues it impacts.
